metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4019 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-4019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-athena - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-common - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-nox - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
xxd - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> in focal and earlier vulnerable function from src/help.c is in src/ex_cmds.c.
